# base-component



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

组件基类
提供通用的属性和方法

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description | Type                                         | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `class`       | `class`        | 组件类名        | `string`                                     | `undefined` |
| `componentId` | `component-id` | 组件ID        | `string`                                     | `undefined` |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`     | 是否禁用        | `boolean`                                    | `false`     |
| `size`        | `size`         | 组件尺寸        | `"large" \| "medium" \| "middle" \| "small"` | `'medium'`  |
| `theme`       | `theme`        | 主题          | `"dark" \| "light"`                          | `'light'`   |
